Biotrine is a larvicide, killing the young larva and kills nematodes.

Biotrine is a larvicide, killing the young larva (caterpillars) and kills nematodes. It also assists the plant in preparing against further attacks from the newlyhatched larvae. \n \n Target Pests include: Tomato leafminer, aphids, whitefies, fall armyworm, spider mites, thrips, false codling moth, nematodes and diamond back moth.
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1nQrNg0vcNQRKSesk8ioUI6GArCx81E4A
A VERSATILE, TOXIN-FREE INSECTICIDE / FUNGICIDE FOR ALL CROPS

INGREDIENTS:
 FIZImite contains a unique blend of safe, physically acting pest and disease control surfactants. 
 
 CONTROL:
 FIZImite controls by physical means. It controls a wide range of pests including: whitefy, aphid, spider mite, mealybug, hard and soft scale insects and bay sucker psyllids. CONTROLS POWDERY MILDEW. 
 
 CROPS:
 Protected and outdoor edible and ornamental crops. APPLICATION METHOD: Foliar spray weekly or as necessary according to crop and situation. Ensure complete cover of top and bottom surfaces of foliage for best efect. 
 
 DILUTION RATE:
 1 ml per litre water.

Antario provides protection against early leaf damage caused by caterpillars and other insects

Antario provides protection against early leaf damage caused by caterpillars and other insects. It contains two biological insecticides: Bacillus thuringiensis kurstaki and Abamectin. The two biological pesticides act together to kill the insect by releasing endotoxins when the insect feeds.

Ceranock is specially designed to minimise fruit damage while signifcantly reducing pesticide application.

Ceranock is specially designed to minimise fruit damage while signifcantly reducing pesticide application. This is a safe, effective and environmentally friendly fruit fy solution. Zero residue in fruit and fresh produce means no more risk to consumers and no adverse effect on benefcial insects or non-target species. Russell IPMâ€™s Ceranock is an innovative, sustainable, practical and residue-free solution for the fruit fy species of Bactrocera, Ceratitis and Dacus.

Fytomax PM is a biorational product based on neem seed extract, with an active ingredient of 0.1% Azadirachtin.

Fytomax PM is a biorational product based on neem seed extract, with an active ingredient of 0.1% Azadirachtin. Fytomax PM has multiple modes of action, but primarily works very well when combined with Biotrine. When used in synergy with Biotrine, it prolongs the effect. When applied in the early stages, Fytomax inhibits fungal diseases and acts as a natural repellent to most insects.

A new concept of sustainable integrated crop management.

Recharge is a powerful formulation of naturally growing microorganisms Trichoderma found in healthy soils. The formulation is capable of empowering your plants, enabling them to remain healthy with improved yield. It unleashes the power of nature and enable crops to fend for themselves whilst combatting the damaging effect of insect pests and fungal attacks. Healthy and robust plants can rise to the challenge and offer a better yield

Yokosan is an organic, liquid, biological fertiliser based on potassium, humate, water extract of worm casting and beneficial microorganisms.

Yokosan is an organic, liquid, biological fertiliser based on potassium, humate, water extract of worm casting and beneficial microorganisms. It is a dark-brown liquid with a pH between 9-10. It is enriched with humic acids, iron, manganese, zinc and copper. The product does not contain synthetic additives or genetically modified organisms. It is an ECOCERT organic-certified product.
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1ZRu2SaPydVKeuczTfUUCYKizJ2FCvcag
BiomaxM is a powerful biological insecticide which kills insect pests on contact.

BiomaxM is a powerful biological insecticide which kills insect pests on contact. This broad spectrum control agent works to paralyse the pests such as sucker and borer insects including, red spider mite, white fly, aphid, other soft bodied insects, tomato leaf miner and otherboring and sucking insect pests. \n \n Biomax M is highly effective against tea red spider mite. Over 95% red spider mites have been controlled when applied Biomax M.

Russell IPM is one of the leading manufacturers of insect pheromone-based monitoring and control products. Our core expertise is behavior modifying insect pheromone and natural material-based Bio-pesticides.
 The Russell IPM headquarters and main production facility is based in Deeside in the UK. In addition, there are five marketing subsidiaries in Spain, Morocco, Algeria, Jordan, China, India and Bangladesh. Working closely with distribution partners Russell IPM supplies a range of insect monitoring and control products worldwide.
 
 Tel: 01959538497
 Email: info@russellipmbd.com
